fields.name: the entrance to the cave
fields.description: The night is calm and silent. North of you, the cave mount beckons.

fields.name: the cave foyer
fields.description: It's eerily silent. Dim moonlight filters in from the outside.

fields.name: a dark hallway
fields.description: A long stretch of emptiness appears to the north. A narrow passage bends to the west.

fields.name: a grand overlook
fields.description: A steep cliff appears before you, falling into the darkness. Ahead to the north, a light flickers in the distance, but there is no way across the chasm. A faint warm glow comes from the east.

fields.name: a large antechamber
fields.description: You start to sense a sinister presence. To the east, there is a bright light.

fields.name: a treasure chamber
fields.description: The smell of gold permeates the air. A room behind a locked door lays just beyond your reach to the south. Is there a way to open it?

fields.name: a locked room
fields.description: Whatever is in here must be worth more than anything else in the cave to have been kept behind lock and key. The smell of fire and brimstone emanates from the east. Are you sure you want to be here?

fields.name: a small alcove
fields.description: A mostly empty room lays barren. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: the dragon's lair
fields.description: You've stumbled upon a an enormous sleeping dragon. It awakens and swifly blocks your retreat!
